summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing for TVUSVET veterinary ultrasound system. All 26 test cases passed with 100% success rate. Backend MongoDB integration, CRUD operations, and image management are working perfectly.
passed_tests: Patients CRUD: CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE, LIST with search
Exams CRUD: CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE, LIST with patient filter
Image upload with multipart form data and proper linking to patient/exam
Image content retrieval with correct content-type headers
Image deletion with automatic unlinking from exams
MongoDB ObjectId removal verification (no _id fields in responses)
Cascade deletion (patient deletion removes associated exams and images)
